医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
索尔克科学家发现胶质母细胞瘤的新免疫疗法胶质母细胞瘤是最常见和致命的脑癌，它会迅速生长，侵入并破坏健康的脑组织。肿瘤向大脑发出癌性卷须，使得手术切除肿瘤变得极其困难或不可能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Salk-scientists-find-new-immunotherapy-treatment-for-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Salk-scientists-find-new-immunotherapy-treatment-for-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d832b11-df74-4282-b68b-38c61aed0bfb Fri, 11 Aug 2023 23:41:03 -0400 Salk scientists find new immunotherapy treatment for glioblastoma
研究发现足球运动员患帕金森病的风险增加识别帕金森病 (PD) 的危险因素对于早期诊断至关重要。早在 20 年代，帕金森氏病和帕金森综合症（一个统称术语，指帕金森氏病和其他疾病中发现的运动症状）就早已在拳击手中得到描述。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Football-players-at-increased-risk-for-Parkinsons-disease-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Football-players-at-increased-risk-for-Parkinsons-disease-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34337131-3138-4cdb-9707-28ff8fac73bf Fri, 11 Aug 2023 23:20:40 -0400 Football players at increased risk for Parkinson's disease, study finds
研究呼吁采取行动捕获气候变化对人类健康影响的实时数据莫纳什大学领导的一项研究提出了一种解决方案，以满足迫切需要捕获气候变化相关事件对人类健康、医疗保健劳动力和护理点医疗保健系统影响的实时数据的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Study-calls-for-action-to-capture-real-time-data-on-climate-change-impact-on- human-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Study-calls-for-action-to-capture-real-time-data-on-climate-change-impact-on- human-health.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73e22efe-6063-40a5-a3e5-34770fae0b5b Fri, 11 Aug 2023 23:14:41 -0400 Study calls for action to capture real-time data on climate change impact on human health
没有证据表明 COVID-19 疫苗会导致运动员心脏骤停或心肌炎现在这几乎已成为一条经验法则：一旦一名运动员因心脏骤停倒地，社交媒体上就会充斥着认为应归咎于 COVID-19 疫苗接种的说法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/No-evidence-that-COVID-19-vaccines-cause-sudden-cardiac-arrest-or-myocarditis-in-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/No-evidence-that-COVID-19-vaccines-cause-sudden-cardiac-arrest-or-myocarditis-in-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c58279e1-a0a5-4ff8-8d3e-c5462cd96b85 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 23:04:53 -0400 No evidence that COVID-19 vaccines cause sudden cardiac arrest or myocarditis in athletes
研究可以提高人机交互人工智能系统的安全性和可靠性研究人员正在开发一种方法，将最人性化的特征之一——不确定性——融入到机器学习系统中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Research-could-improve-the-safety-and-reliability-of- human-in-the-loop-AI-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Research-could-improve-the-safety-and-reliability-of- human-in-the-loop-AI-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab3a8f15-f7fd-411e-9645-98d2090c45b9 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 22:51:14 -0400 Research could improve the safety and reliability of human-in-the-loop AI systems
坚韧的生物医学科学家在大流行期间经历了挫折当 COVID-19 给世界带来现代历史上最大的健康挑战时，生物医学科学家加紧开发诊断测试和疫苗以减缓疾病的传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Resilient-biomedical-scientists-experienced-setbacks-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Resilient-biomedical-scientists-experienced-setbacks-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09ab67fa-b7a8-4370-9fbd-c18307f4fa3b Fri, 11 Aug 2023 22:45:45 -0400 Resilient biomedical scientists experienced setbacks during the pandemic
研究人员发现调节大脑中多巴胺释放的离子通道开关研究人员已经发现了两个调节大脑中多巴胺释放的离子通道开关，这是有一天可能会为目前几乎没有解决方案的多种疾病和病症带来治疗方法的第一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Researchers-identify-ion-channel-switches-that-regulate-dopamine-release-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Researchers-identify-ion-channel-switches-that-regulate-dopamine-release-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6345bdd-cd51-419c-9c4c-c57bc3e23c14 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 22:37:26 -0400 Researchers identify ion channel switches that regulate dopamine release in the brain
研究重点是长新冠患者站立 10 分钟后双腿变蓝根据《柳叶刀》发表的新研究，一名新冠肺炎患者在站立 10 分钟后双腿变蓝，这是一个不寻常的案例，这凸显了患者需要提高对这种症状的认识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Research-focuses-on-Long-Covid-病人-legs-turning-blue-after-10-minutes-of-stand.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Research-focuses-on-Long-Covid-病人-legs-turning-blue-after-10-minutes-of-stand.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cef3fd8-2957-48c4-8b5f-e80c0b129ce3 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 22:33:36 -0400 Research focuses on Long Covid patient's legs turning blue after 10 minutes of standing
家长和临床医生就儿科决策达成共识其他人应该如何为儿科患者做出决定？几十年来，学术文献中一直存在关于儿童医疗决策的伦理原则的争论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Parents-and-clinicians-reach-consensus-on-pediatric-decision-making.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Parents-and-clinicians-reach-consensus-on-pediatric-decision-making.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78d3c5e3-7aab-4b4d-8385-9669492080e6 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 22:09:29 -0400 Parents and clinicians reach consensus on pediatric decision-making
更正：空气污染与老年人非肺癌风险增加有关哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院领导的一项研究表明，长期接触细颗粒空气污染物 (PM2.5) 和二氧化氮 (NO2) 可能会增加老年人患非肺癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/CORRECTION-Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-risk-of-non-lung-cancers-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/CORRECTION-Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-risk-of-non-lung-cancers-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc3c9c9d-2b3a-4340-8092-2e42c26c71ac Fri, 11 Aug 2023 21:33:23 -0400 CORRECTION: Air pollution linked to increased risk of non-lung cancers in older adults
